channel.title: Requiring an advanced development team for a serious project
channel.description:
[center][img]http://xythax.org/images/logo.png[/img]
[size=13pt][b]Welcome, MoparScape, to my development team thread![/b][/size] [/center] [hr]
Okay, so for the past few weeks I've been thinking about opening up another server, and I have came to the conclusion that I'm going to do it. The only problem is, I'm very bad with Java programming. I'm mainly a website developer, I don't know very much at all about java. So I need a development team to even get started. I'm sick and tired of seeing these servers that are 317 loading 600+ and what not, and I'm sick and tired of seeing PI everywhere. I want this server to be renowned for being the server people talk about and want to be like. Not only within the programming side of RSPS, but also the player side. I know that as a previous server owner, players don't necessarily require huge amounts of content and all-new never-before-seen content. Players generally look for stability and a nice, knowledgeable community, this is what I'm willing to provide. I'm also sick and tired of seeing kids who are only hosting their servers for the money gained from them, this wasn't the sole purpose that RuneScape Private Servers were brought into this world for. They're used for fun, not for money. These are only some of the aspects I'd be incorporating into Xythax.
[b]Why should we work beside you?[/b]
I've been around MoparScape for the best part of a year now, and I've watched private servers develop over the years. MoparScape/Moparisthebest.com has always been the only community I use, because I like what it stands for. I now call upon the people who are also "loyal" in a sense of the word, to MoparScape. I speak for a huge amount of us when I say it is horrid when I see a 317 server loading a high cache. I'm also fed up of seeing kids just download a server, add 3 commands and re-release it. What I want to achieve is a good, stable server, which is friendly for everyone playing. I want it to be 317, loading no higher than 508. By this, I mean a hyperion/apollo source totally written into perfection. I'd also happily release it with all credits to the Xythax Development Team, just to give something back to the MoparScape community, this will obviously be the decision of our entire development team.
[b]Why do you post this now?[/b] Well, it just so happens I've came into a bit of money lately. I have around a 200$ budget to get this server started, I've already bought the domain and a hosting package and uploaded the homepage. This link will be given upon request until I get verified by a moderator to display it. I believe that with 200$, we could buy even a 30-40$ vps for the first month, buy gold server status on a few toplists and get an advertisement. I think with that, we'd gain a good starting base of players. Any money gained by this server through donations and such, will be kept in my paypal and will [b]only be used for the server[/b].
[b]How can I apply?[/b] You can apply by filling out the following application. As stated in the title, I do not want programmers who are new to Java, this calls for experience and dedication from people who know where I'm coming from and have an obvious set of goals. These people must also be very trustworthy, and will have respect for the other members of the team and their ideas. You must be mature and willing to devote as much of your time as possible. I respect that in the U.S that there are still final exams and stuff going on, this can be excused.
Here's the application form: [code] Name: Age: Experience: Proof of experience: Skype/MSN: Do you use DropBox: Preferred base to use: Can you work well with others: [/code]
I will keep checking on this post every hour or so to check applications and try and recruit as many developers as needed. I will also fill out the below staff list to let you know the spaces that are left.
[center] [b]Founder & Website Developer[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=534060]Ruby[/url]
[b]Java Developers[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=547809]Rodgerwilco[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=549400]KroniKz_[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=386936]eyeownyew[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=498197]Whackatre[/url] [i]Open [/i] [b]Suggesters and BETA testers[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=485823]Loveandpower[/url] [i]Open Open Open [/i] [/center] [hr]
[b]Update Log[/b] [code] 4th June - Website created. 4th June - Development Thread Created. 4th June - Rodgerwilco hired as a developer. 4th June - Decision to create a F2P and P2P remake of RuneScape using Rodgerwilco's base. 4th June - KroniKz_ hired as a developer. 4th June - Loveandpower recruited as a suggester and beta tester. 4th June - Whacatre hired as a developer. 4th June - eyeownyew hired as a developer. [/code]
[hr]
Thanks for taking the time to read through all of that, I appreciate it was a long-winded way of writing it, but I had to get my whole point and idea across. I did not mean to offend anyone who is new to Java programming, but I do require experience in this project, however, you are more than welcome to use our community.
Many thanks, Ruby.

Anyone who wishes to apply for this development team, please use our updated thread here.

item.title: Requiring an advanced development team for a serious project
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Omer_, post:2, topic:443932”]This seems like an interesting project, I support your motive.
Would you mind if I sent you my application through PM?[/quote]
I’d be more than happy for you to do that.[quote=“sinisoul, post:39, topic:443915”][quote author=Omer_ link=topic=546596.msg4029240#msg4029240 date=1340588464]

Slightly intermerested. Not sure if I want to put in an application.

They could use your expertise.
[/quote]

I’m worried it wouldn’t work out, but anyway.

Name: Age: 17 Experience: About three years. Proof of experience: https://github.com/SiniSoul Look around. Skype/MSN: sinisoul@live.com/Hadyn <- Skype Do you use DropBox: No. Git is better. Preferred base to use: I haven't used anything other base than something I wrote in the last two years. Can you work well with others: Of course. [/quote]

You’re accepted, of course. I’ll add you on msn right now.

If you take a look over at my other post in here about extending the development team, you’ll see the ret of the members.

Read full topic

item.title: Requiring an advanced development team for a serious project
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:36, topic:443915”][quote author=sriahciboon link=topic=546596.msg4027056#msg4027056 date=1340419434]
Name: Aaron Starling

Age: 16

Experience: I’m not much for Java coding, looking to be a Beta Tester. I have been playing since I was 10 however I have only recently (possibly within the last year) been bug testing for various servers.

Proof of experience: None as far as I can find, none of the servers I tested for became official.

Skype: Call_me_aaron

Do you use DropBox: Yes

Preferred base to use: PI/Hybrid but I’m not picky.

Can you work well with others: Yes

Other: I would love to be apart of the beta testing revolving around the development of the server. I see much potential and would love to help however I can. (possibly graphics or web design later on?)
[/quote]
Im a website developer so the web development is handled by me.

As for anyone who wishes to beta test for us, follow the link in my sig, alpha launches in two days.[/quote]

I was aware you were the existing website developer, however I will continue to follow your thread in case something does come up!
Until then I’ll wait for Alpha!

Read full topic

item.title: Requiring an advanced development team for a serious project
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Would you guys please take the FC stuff off this topic, I mean, come on. I’ve already worked things out with love, there’s no need for this, I can’t make a post on here without someone bringing it up, I’ve tried explaining and a lot of you are just stubborn.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:25, topic:443915”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=546596.msg4007539#msg4007539 date=1338822338]

Ruby and I have made up since then. He’s a good guy and If I didn’t have real life issues I’d apply my own self whack.

Doesn’t matter if you made up, he still wiped the website.
[/quote]fc isn’t even up anymore give it a rest

[quote author=TinyScape link=topic=546596.msg4007579#msg4007579 date=1338826498]

[quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=546596.msg4007539#msg4007539 date=1338822338]

Ruby and I have made up since then. He’s a good guy and If I didn’t have real life issues I’d apply my own self whack.

[/quote]Yeah, I lost all the porn Fridder sent me :L
[/quote]could easily pm requesting passes LOL[/quote]

Thanks for saying that, hopefully they’ll realise.

[quote=“Onix, post:19, topic:443915”]<3 this. I am so sick of all the shitty 317’s the shitty 317’s loading 600+ and the shitty 317 PI server. I would apply and all, but the team you have at the moment looks good enough.

Good luck with this, and I hope all goes well.[/quote]

Thanks mate.

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:17, topic:443915”]Name: Nicholas Armstrong,
Age: 15
Experience: Worked on a few servers, current project is Mercury -
Proof of experience: PM
Skype/MSN: Nicky_snowboardingmaster@hotmail.com
Do you use DropBox: Si senior
Preferred base to use: Any base is fine TBH,
Can you work well with others: Yeah[/quote]

You’ve been accepted, welcome to the team :P.

Read full topic
